Building.Title: Barbarian Hut
Building.Description: Troop building that periodically deploys Barbarians to fight the enemy. Time to make the Barbarians.

Building.Title: Bomb Tower
Building.Description: Defensive building that houses a Bomber. Deals area damage to anything dumb enough to stand near it.

Building.Title: Elixir Collector
Building.Description: You gotta spend Elixir to make Elixir.

Building.Title: Furnace
Building.Description: The Furnace spawns two Fire Spirits at a time. It also makes great brick-oven pancakes.

Building.Title: Goblin Hut
Building.Description: Building that spawns Spear Goblins. But don't look inside. You don't want to see how they are made.

Building.Title: Inferno Tower
Building.Description: Defensive building, roasts targets for damage that increases over time. Burns through even the biggest and toughest enemies!

Building.Title: Mortar
Building.Description: Defensive building with a long range. Shoots exploding shells that deal area damage. Cannot shoot at targets that get very close!

Building.Title: Tesla
Building.Description: Defensive building. Whenever it's not zapping the enemy, the power of Electrickery is best kept grounded.

Building.Title: Cannon
Building.Description: Defensive building. Shoots cannonballs with deadly effect, but cannot target flying troops.

Building.Title: X-Bow
Building.Description: Nice tower you got there. Would be a shame if this X-Bow whittled it down from this side of the arena...

Building.Title: Tombstone
Building.Description: Troop building that periodically deploys Skeletons to fight the enemy. When destroyed, spawns 4 Skeletons. Creepy!
